info.title: API-Management Lookup API
info.description: This API is some kind of helper API to allow Logstash to enrich the data inserted into ElasticSearch. Initially this API was required to lookup the API being called to get the organization of this API

200.description: Returned if the API has been found

404.description: Returned if the API can't be found.

parameters.name: apiPath
parameters.description: The exposed path of the API to be looked up

parameters.name: apiName
parameters.description: The name of the API to look up

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: If given the operationId (e.g. getUserByName) is also used to identify the correct API

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Domain-Group where this event was created. It's used to determined which API-Manager to use for the API-Details Lookup.
If the parameter: API_MANAGER is configured with multiple groupIds this groupId is used to determine which API-Manager to use.
API_MANAGER=group-5#https://manager-1:8075, group-2#https://manager-2:8075, ....

get.summary: Looks up an API based on the API-Path
get.description: This endpoint is taking in the API-Path (e.g. /v1/my/api) and tries to find this API in the Axway API-Management system. If successful it returns the API-Details.
